speaker: Dr. Red
dialog: I'm not really sure how to tell you this...

speaker: Blue
dialog: Just give it to me straight, Doc

speaker: Dr. Red
dialog: According to your charts, you only have one, maybe two years left to live.

speaker: Dr. Red
dialog: I understand that this is a lot to take in, but I can assure you that this condition of yours is no joking matter.

speaker: Dr. Red
dialog: If you agree to it, we would like to keep you here a bit longer to run some more tests.

speaker: Blue
dialog: Just do whatever you need to do.

speaker: Dr. Red
dialog: Nurse Yellow will assist you in the last room at the end of the hallway...
